name: Cock Block
description:
Cock Block is a humorous bar based exploration game. You are a man named Jawsh whose sole objective of the night is to break up Todd and Linda as they seem happy. Explore and solve puzzles by talking to other bar goers to gain all of the necessary items to stage a fake wedding proposal for Todd and Linda. This should successfully break them up as it is their first date.

Process Blog: https://github.com/gafr4910/C-ck-Block-Game/tree/master/Process
